医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究：英国五分之一的戒烟者目前吸电子烟根据 UCL（伦敦大学学院）研究人员领导的一项新研究，在英国，戒烟一年以上的人中约有五分之一目前正在使用电子烟，相当于 220 万人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Study-One-in- Five-ex-smokers-currently-vape-in​​-England.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Study-One-in- Five-ex-smokers-currently-vape-in​​-England.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c2edcf5f-a835-4f6e-8df4-6a6ab769d411 Thu, 21 Nov 2024 07:27:49 -0500 Study: One in five ex-smokers currently vape in England
小的脑穿透分子为治疗侵袭性脑肿瘤带来了希望糖胶肽通过抑制核苷酸合成来选择性杀死胶质母细胞瘤细胞，显示出与替莫唑胺联合使用的治疗选择的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Small-brain-penetration-molecule-offers-hope-for-treating-aggressive-brain-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Small-brain-penetration-molecule-offers-hope-for-treating-aggressive-brain-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5fb20a74-174a-43d0-973e-6e64c31d7916 Thu, 21 Nov 2024 07:26:00 -0500 Small brain-penetrating molecule offers hope for treating aggressive brain tumors
人工智能可以通过分析声音的细微变化来检测帕金森病伊拉克和澳大利亚的研究人员表示，能够检测人声音细微变化的算法正在成为帕金森病的潜在新诊断工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/AI-could-detect-Parkinsons-disease-by-analyzing-subtle-changes-in-voice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/AI-could-detect-Parkinsons-disease-by-analyzing-subtle-changes-in-voice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5787432e-8a2f-4cf4-b02d-e057fe0d5b8f Thu, 21 Nov 2024 07:20:39 -0500 AI could detect Parkinson's disease by analyzing subtle changes in voice
伪装检测增强了脑肿瘤诊断的神经网络研究表明，经过伪装检测训练的 CNN 可以改善 MRI 扫描中的脑肿瘤分类，凸显了非常规训练的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Camouflage-detection-boosts-neural-networks-for-brain-tumor-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Camouflage-detection-boosts-neural-networks-for-brain-tumor-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=44b12885-c76f-4ab1-8951-06379fe8046e Thu, 21 Nov 2024 07:07:00 -0500 Camouflage detection boosts neural networks for brain tumor diagnosis
有压力和心理健康症状的孕妇的唾液微生物存在差异研究将口腔微生物与孕产妇心理健康联系起来，揭示了怀孕期间增强心理健康的潜在干预措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Saliva-microbes-differ-in-pregnant-women-with-stress-and-mental-health-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Saliva-microbes-differ-in-pregnant-women-with-stress-and-mental-health-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=50d7eea2-98c8-44c0-adf9-b320b3c983bd Thu, 21 Nov 2024 06:54:00 -0500 Saliva microbes differ in pregnant women with stress and mental health symptoms
新分子促进肠道愈合并抑制结直肠癌肿瘤生长卡罗林斯卡学院的研究人员发现了一种分子，它既可以帮助肠道受损后愈合，又可以抑制结直肠癌中的肿瘤生长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/New-molecule-promotes-gut-healing-and-suppresses-tumor-growth-in-colorectal-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/New-molecule-promotes-gut-healing-and-suppresses-tumor-growth-in-colorectal-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cac96564-30c9-498d-83b5-6719dea56a81 Thu, 21 Nov 2024 06:50:15 -0500 New molecule promotes gut healing and suppresses tumor growth in colorectal cancer
修饰的达罗巴汀为对抗抗生素耐药细菌带来了希望抗菌药物对于治疗感染很重要。但细菌对现有药物的耐药性日益增加；所以它们不能很好地工作，甚至根本不能工作-；意味着迫切需要新的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Modified-darobactin-offers-hope-for-combatting-antibiotic-pressive-bacteria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Modified-darobactin-offers-hope-for-combatting-antibiotic-pressive-bacteria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ab6e679a-615f-438e-a03c-b5c3f7f3f930 Thu, 21 Nov 2024 06:21:16 -0500 Modified darobactin offers hope for combatting antibiotic-resistant bacteria
研究预计到 2030 年全球抗生素使用量将增加 50% 以上一项研究显示，从 2016 年到 2023 年，全球抗生素使用量增加了 20.9%，其中中等收入国家引领这一增长趋势，并凸显了耐药性问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Study-projects-global-antibiotic-use-to-rise-by-over-5025-by-2030.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Study-projects-global-antibiotic-use-to-rise-by-over-5025-by-2030.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b0ae9ccb-864a-4cfc-b224-8178fccaaca9 Thu, 21 Nov 2024 06:15:00 -0500 Study projects global antibiotic use to rise by over 50% by 2030
华盛顿的权力已经转移。以下是《平价医疗法案》可能发生的转变。当选总统唐纳德·特朗普重返白宫可能会让那些想要削弱或废除《平价医疗法案》的共和党人更加大胆，但实施如此彻底的变革仍然需要克服程序和政治障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Washington-power-has-shifted-Heree28099s-how-the-ACA-may-shift-too.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Washington-power-has-shifted-Heree28099s-how-the-ACA-may-shift-too.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=31af3e0d-3d25-40e7-84b0-d59564e9d308 Thu, 21 Nov 2024 06:15:00 -0500 Washington power has shifted. Here’s how the ACA may shift, too.
健康女性的罕见基因突变可能是乳腺癌起源的关键不列颠哥伦比亚大学 (UBC)、不列颠哥伦比亚省癌症中心、哈佛医学院和纪念斯隆凯特琳癌症中心 (MSK) 的研究人员查明了乳腺癌的早期遗传起源；健康细胞中出现的癌症样突变女性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Rare-genic-mutations-in-healthy-women-may-be-key-to-breast-cancer-origins.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Rare-genic-mutations-in-healthy-women-may-be-key-to-breast-cancer-origins.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=82e833c0-719c-4303-a93c-e828ef73fa04 Thu, 21 Nov 2024 06:13:56 -0500 Rare genetic mutations in healthy women may be key to breast cancer origins
